name: config-driven-helper
description: enable driving cookbooks that are not normally config driven to be so

recipes.apache-sites: Propagates sites from node config to web_app
recipes.nginx-sites: Propagates sites from node config to nginx site
recipes.mysql-users: Creates mysql users using the database cookbook
recipes.mysql-ruby: Installs MySQL ruby gem in chef ruby
recipes.mysql-databases: Creates mysql databases using the database cookbook
